stormy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: with strong winds, heavy rain, and dark clouds
stormy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The sky was starting to look stormy.
stormy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a stormy relationship, meeting etc is full of strong and often angry feelings
stormy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: stormy seas are very rough, with big waves that are caused by strong winds
